title: Hour 1: Notre Dame comes to town
description:
Louis Riddick, Harry Douglas and Sam Acho all join the show to discuss whether Aaron Rodgers or Davante Adams has more to prove. The crew then debates if Lamar Jackson should play without a new contract, and if Trey Lance gives the 49ers the best chance to win. Plus, Notre Dame Head Coach Marcus Freeman joins the show to discuss the upcoming season and conference realignment.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Hour 1: Marcus Freeman joins the show
